閑.definition: enclosure; (variant of 閒|闲[xian2]) idle; unoccupied; leisure

閑坐.definition: to sit around; to sit idly

閑居.definition: to lead a quiet and peaceful life in retirement; to stay home with nothing to do; to lead a solitary life

閑心.definition: leisurely mood; relaxed frame of mind

閑暇.definition: leisure; free time; unoccupied; not in use

閑章.definition: recreative seal, bearing not the owner's name but a well-known verse or such, and used for artistic purposes on paintings etc

閑職.definition: sinecure; position with practically no obligations

閑言碎語.definition: idle gossip; irrelevant nonsense; slanderous rumor

閑談.definition: variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
